page.title: 15A VET'S LIFE AND WARREN FARM
page.content:
My dad is a vet,he works for the Ministry of Agriculture.He helps prevent diseases from coming on to the island.He works from 8:30 to 5:00,but if something is urgent,he could be called at any time.There are only a few diseases on the island.My dad helps to keep diseases like rabies off the island.Our island was the last place to have foot and mouth disease.My dad also goes round farms to check if the animals are okay and that the animals are treated properly. Warren Farm is a dairy farm.We buy our milk from the farm.Warren farm is built on the Warren.
Stewart Warrall 9 years
